subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After playing for Seton Hall, Nick Galis inspired a nation by lifting Greece over the Soviet Union in the 1987 European championships, the highlight of his storied career. His former team, Aris, recently honored him.
snippet: After playing for Seton Hall, Nick Galis inspired a nation by lifting Greece over the Soviet Union in the 1987 European championships, the highlight of his storied career. His former team, Aris, recently honored him.
